rows.label: tlk41700321_04_msg0001
rows.name:
My job lately is to post
flyers on the notice board.

rows.label: tlk41700321_04_msg0002
rows.name:
We're short-staffed, you see. I may be
the representative of the Gulan people,
but I have to do the small jobs too.

rows.label: tlk41700321_04_msg0003
rows.name: Do you ever look at them?

rows.label: tlk41700321_04_msg0004
rows.name:
I hope you'll remember
that I'm the one who finds
the time to post them.
